content: Your best advise for people visiting your country pls..Philippines - Dont use Airport Cabs, use the white cabs instead if you want to save 50% off your first cab fare.Bring mosquito repellantPublic Transport Drivers especially tricycle drivers know the best spots not just the popular ones. edit: to test bug deleting message the next reply will be from my alt "piso456" and I will try to delete it using this "jamyr" account.
